languages.text: Whenever the wearer is under the effect of Reckless Rush: -All wearer's attacks gain +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. -The wearer gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. -All attacks against the wearer gain +50% critical hit chance and the wearer suffers +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
[draft] Whenever the wielder is under {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Reckless Rush:
- all wielder's attacks are critical
- wielder gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical damage{/g}
- whenever wielder is {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} by attack, this attack is always critical and it's critical damage is increased by 50%

Whenever the wearer is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Reckless Rush: - all wearer's attacks gain +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} - the wearer gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical damage{/g} - all attacks against the wearer gain +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} chance and the wearer suffers +50% critical damage

Whenever the wearer is under the effect of Reckless Rush: -All wearer's attacks gain +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. -The wearer gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. -All attacks against the wearer gain +50% critical hit chance and the wearer suffers +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Когда на персонажа действует эффект Дерзкий прием: -Все атаки персонажа получают +50% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g}. -Персонаж получает +50% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому урону{/g}. -Все атаки против персонажа получают +50% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} и наносят на 50% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is under the effect of Reckless Rush: -All wearer's attacks gain +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. -The wearer gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. -All attacks against the wearer gain +50% critical hit chance and the wearer suffers +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда на персонажа действует {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} Дерзкий прием: - все атаки персонажа получают +50% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического попадания{/g} - персонаж получает +50% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическому урону{/g} - все атаки против персонажа получают +50% к шансу критического попадания и наносят на 50% больше урона

Когда на персонажа действует {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} Дерзкий прием: - все атаки персонажа получают +50% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического попадания{/g} - персонаж получает +50% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическому урону{/g} - все атаки против персонажа получают +50% к шансу критического попадания и наносят на 50% больше урона

languages.text: 当装备者处于鲁莽冲刺{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}时： - 装备者所有攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高50%。 - 装备者造成的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高50%。 - 所有针对装备者的攻击有50%额外几率造成暴击，装备者承受的暴击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Reckless Rush: -All wearer's attacks gain +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. -The wearer gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. -All attacks against the wearer gain +50% critical hit chance and the wearer suffers +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者处于鲁莽冲刺{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}时: - 装备者所有攻击的暴击率提高50%。{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}{/g} - 装备者造成的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}提高50%。 - 所有针对装备者的攻击有50%额外几率造成暴击，装备者承受的暴击伤害提高50%。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}

languages.text: 着用者が無謀な突進の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}の下にある時は： - 着用者の全攻撃のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}が+50%増加する。 - 着用者は{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が+50%増加する。 -着用者に対するすべての攻撃のクリティカル命中率が+50%増加し、その着用者は+50%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Reckless Rush: -All wearer's attacks gain +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. -The wearer gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. -All attacks against the wearer gain +50% critical hit chance and the wearer suffers +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が急ぎの仕事の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の下にある時は、以下の効果を得る。 - 着用者の全攻撃のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}が+50％増加する - 着用者は{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が+50％増加する -着用者に対する全ての攻撃のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}率が+50％増加し、その着用者は+50％のクリティカルダメージを受ける

languages.text: Cuando el portador está bajo los {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efectos{/g} de Avance temerario: -Todos los ataques del portador ganan un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico. -El portador gana +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}. -Todos los ataques contra el portador ganan +50 % de probabilidad de impacto crítico y el portador sufre +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} crítico.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Reckless Rush: -All wearer's attacks gain +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. -The wearer gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. -All attacks against the wearer gain +50% critical hit chance and the wearer suffers +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador está bajo los {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efectos{/g} de Avance temerario: - todos los ataques del portador ganan un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico - el portador gana +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}daño crítico{/g} - todos los ataques contra el portador ganan +50 % de probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico y el portador sufre +50 % de daño crítico

languages.text: Wann immer der Träger unter dem Effekt von Rücksichtsloser Ansturm steht: -Alle Angriffe des Trägers erhalten +50 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} -Der Träger erhält +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g} -Sämtliche Angriffe gegen den Träger erhalten +50 % kritische Trefferchance und der Träger erleidet +50 % kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Träger unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} von Rücksichtsloser Ansturm steht: - Alle Angriffe des Trägers erhalten +50 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} - Der Träger erhält +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Schaden{/g} - Sämtliche Angriffe gegen den Träger erhalten +50 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Trefferchance{/g} und der Träger erleidet +50 % kritischen Schaden

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur est sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de Ruée Irrépressible : - Toutes les attaques de l'utilisateur bénéficient de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique. - L'utilisateur bénéficie de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}. - Toutes les attaques menées contre l'utilisateur bénéficient de +50 % de chances d'infliger un coup critique et l'utilisateur subit +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} critiques.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur est sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de Ruée Irrépressible : - toutes les attaques de l'utilisateur bénéficient de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique - l'utilisateur bénéficie de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}dégâts critiques{/g} - toutes les attaques menées contre l'utilisateur bénéficient de +50 % de chances d'infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique et l'utilisateur subit +50 % de dégâts critiques
